author: Jennifer Calderbank
review: Highly recommend! Friendly, professional, and easy to work with. We have lived in two different units with MMRA and have recently assigned our lease to a new tenant. They make the process straightforward and are very communicative (always

author: Alex Martinez
review: While my girlfriend and I were renting from MMRA the staff were enjoyable to talk with and communicated through email and text consistently fast. That is why they get three stars.

author: Leila Halbert
review: If I could give zero stars, I would. This company is TERRIBLE. I've been living in my apartment for almost 6 years and the owner is great, but a couple of years ago he hired MMRA to take care of things and it's been nothing but headache

author: c Scott
review: Less than 1 star.  The 18 year old girls who work at MMRA are hateful, terrible and disrespectful.  They are on a complete power trip. The fees we are charged are ridiculous...an $80 "convenience fee" to pay rent with a debit card.

author: Brandon Cheers
review: Probably the worst company I've ever dealt with. Charged us for carpet replacement when the carpets weren't even replaced to begin with, we took pictures all over the house and it was in desperate need of repairs, yet they're all racking

author: Sam Patterson

author: Scott
review: I could go on and on about how horrific this company is. Our house is in horrible shape and has been untouched by this company. Rust on doors, broken blinds on windows, paint splatter from terrible contractor work all over walls, stained

author: mike fernase
review: Trash, is the only word needed to describe this property management company. The front desk woman is either incompetent or just completely doesn't care about her job. She lost the paper work I turned in THREE TIMES and still counting.

author: jennifer b

author: Aubrey LaPlante

author: Cierra M.

author: Deena Resnick
review: kicked us out for maintenance during the pandemic. refused to pay for temporary housing. they said we could live there during maintenance if we wanted instead of a hotel, but when we came home one day, we found our toilet on the front step

author: Sheryl Wolfe
review: Daughter went in today within the 48 hour window to sign lease for sept 1 start.  The date on the contract had been changed to July, when she asked about the date she was told that now the apartment contract started in July so sign now or

author: Jon R
review: I was a tenant with mmra for about a year and a half. The move in was easy, we took over a lease from the previous tenant, filled out a transfer form and that was it, I was told to pay the previous tenant X amount for the deposit, which I

author: RaZeVortex
review: I think the term Property "management" is lost on this company. They have managed nothing since we've moved in. Their blatant dismissal of severe property issues is appalling. There have been several phone calls/emails asking over and over

author: Rachel Meek
review: Me and my husband are currently renting from them and so far not much has been communicated. We weren't told about renter's insurance (although we already had it), they didn't clarify if our water was well or city water- I had to ask the

author: Tatajue Ruiz
review: If I could. I'd give this a negative number. I stated from the beginning about my 4th degree assault dang near 4 years ago. Kyle Johnson said after I was upfront about credit criminal and rental I should be alright.  Proceed to fill out

author: Hannah Jones (Hannah's Homes)

author: Patrick Figari
review: MMRA is a Complete scam, my roommates and I lived in a house for 3 years and got charged a thousand dollars each on top of the deposit for re carpeting and repainting the entire house when it was arguably wear and tear after 3 years. We

author: Why Am I here
review: Please don't rent from these people. We rent 4 eagle crest court and when we moved in the rent was 1300 on top of that you have to pay 75 for garbage that comes only twice a month plus water which we got the bill and it's 700 dollars either

author: Cynthia Haltom
review: I don't think a person's personality or being upfront with the facts constitutes a good management company.  What does, however, make a good management company is making sure their side of the contract is fulfilled especially when there is

author: Lin Grzes
review: I am so disgusted and disappointed with this company.  I viewed a duplex and after being late, the agent was rude and shoved us through the place in about 5 min. Regardless, I put in an application because it was a great location and the

author: Bradley Lamb (BigHatChappy)
review: They're business model is to prey on students who don't know their rights. They will often send 'maintience workers' by to snoop around the house and go in rooms without permission to see if you are living up to their standard. Genuinely

author: Corless116
review: 6 months lead time required to renew a lease is absolutely unnecessary in this market. Suggest sticking to 30 day notice to vacate, most Bellingham rentals are off the market in less than a week. Did not uphold lawn care service which was

author: Kelly Black
review: Run dont walk away from this poorly managed company.   You will not get your security deposit back and they will charge you for damages  that dont exist or were there at move in.  The fact that they require you to sign an

author: Lynda Erickson
review: Started renting a home from MMRA just over two months ago and theyve been a pleasure to work with. The staff are all friendly and professional. The majority of communication has been through the companys portal, which is very user friendly and efficient. Id highly recommend MMRA.

author: ONYX
review: DONT FALL FOR IT. If I could give zero stars I would. this is absolutely the worst company you can go through. happy to get you into a home. But They don't care about the people. They are all about money and nickle and dime you for

author: Rana Courchaine (Rana Keith)
review:
MMRA is a reality company that is straight to the point, clear and covers all parties under Lease accordance to tenant/landlord laws. I LOVE IT...
its so refreshing to have someone treat me as a person and not a credit score

author: Katy Hartmaier
review: This is one of the best property management companies my husband and I have worked with.

author: William Fowler
review: Four years on, after they managed a property for us, and I cant forget the atrocious communication that hurt us and tenants.  Do not use for property management or sign a lease with them.

author: Morgan G
review: MMRA  always responded extremely quickly to maintenance requests, kept my apartmemt building  looking clean and presentable, and had a friendly staff.  Cant give five stars, due to the hundreds of excuses to charge you more and take more of your deposit. But thats real estate am I right?

author: Greg Posey
review:
Zero Stars. The worst company ever. They will charge you for any everything. $70.00 for an invoice. Move out they don't allow you to be there during walk thru then charge you cleaning and carpet when it has already been done.
The worst most deceitful company ever. Zero Stars is to good for them!!

author: Molly Schelbert
review: Awful, deceitful, scammers! In a college town filled with young people trying to get a start and just learning the ins and outs of being on their own, MMRA shamelessly takes advantage of them. It is sad that property owners in Bellingham

author: Liz Taunton
review: Leased through MMRA for two years.  They were very prompt on all maintenance, professional through the lease process, and accommodating through the close out process. I would be happy to rent through them again.

author: Debi Menickelly
review: Prey on unsuspecting students to not only keep the security deposit, but also charge addition cleaning, painting, and misc fees without legal justification. Refuse to provide adequate documentation and then send to collections. Time for parents to lawyer up and take it to court.

author: AK Primate
review: Applied for an apartment with this trash management company.. Pass everything from background checks and credit checks 2 weeks later someone else applies for the same apartment and gets it? Seriously this company is trash I do not recommend them, the only thing they are good at is leading you on.

author: ldegoes
review: I would give the 0 stars if i could!!! They are horrible!!  They treat you terribly and if you call them for anything you get back huge attitude to the point where you want to talk to anyone in higher Management and they wont let you. I

author: Kimberly Young-Calton
review: We have always had positive interactions when ever ther ed is a problem or concern.  There have been no hidden fees and problems and prompt maintenance for any issues.  Thank you for making living  here in the foothills easy.

author: Meghan Murphy
review: Do not rent through this company. They are manipulative and will try to swindle money out of you at the end of your lease. Do not trust them.

author: Scott Pilgrim
review:
The ladies and gentlemen who work at this establishment are some of the most prompt and reliable realtors I have ever had the pleasure of working with.
Special thanks go to Shanna, Shawn, and Serina for their inifinite patience and work ethic.

author: Jason Tea
review: I would choose to live anywhere that Misty Mountains is in charge of, Tyrel Jackson was and still is an absolute delight to work with. Very professional individual, and upfront with all the facts.

author: JD Eigenray
review: Good luck grabbing a unit from them. Horrible experience and not worth it. Would rent anywhere else including a shack full of toxic ooze.

author: Kena Greer Brashear
review: Best property management company in Bellingham!  Tyrel and Bret treat their clients with the utmost level of respect.

author: Harry Warren
review: Terrible real estate firm, constant unnecessary fees, ghastly customer service, especially from Claire at the front desk, and they will try to squeeze every cent they can from you with absolutely no just cause.

author: eDDi Hughes
review: Thanks Tyrel and Serena for streamlining the process, happy to have work with them. Can't wait to pick up the keys!

author: Angela Reed
review: Been renting from MMRA for years great management company and wonderful people to work with.

author: Jon Toner
review: Don't rent from MMRA. By far the worst real estate management company ever

author: Matthew Stidham
review: They did everything right when we were under their management, and followed the law.

author: lisa Cates
review: Have never had problems with them

author: Aidan Alsept
review: Worst company ever, they are awful and a scam

author: daniel calton
review: Been very good to us. Thanks.

author: W M
review: Don't trust them

author: Aidan
review: So shady, stay away.

author: Rebecca Bailey
review: Super helpful staff!

author: Paul Weaver
review: Nice honest people
